manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The fashion top the perfect addition to your wardrobe for your Summer adventures, featuring linen blend material, v-neckline, button up front, mid length cuffed sleeves and a relaxed fit. The flattering and feminine v-neck design retouches your face and extends your neck visually, makes you look sexy and elegant. Perfect for Everywhere and Everyone Needs the All-Match T-Shirts, With the all-match t shirt, you will be the one who catch people’s attraction in any occasion! For Work, wear the shirt will help you release fatigue. For Daily Life, it is loose enough and flexible for you to do any sports and relax yourself to enjoy leisure time. For Beach, you will feel the sunshine on you and wind slowly blow through the shirt, what a relaxed vacation! For a Dating, the v-neck will emphasize your beauty, catch his eyes.

various ways to wear as you like Different Ways to wear Looks great loose, you can tuck it into trousers, jeans, or skirts to show off your curves.Tuck front part of the shirt and hang down the back part to cover your butt for a slouchy look, you won't feel too tight.Hang down the whole shirts with leggings or jeans for a casual look.Split hem is easy to tuck in or tie knot for a stylish look. Fashion match： Great to pair with your necklace which make you look more fashion.Perfect with shorts, denim jeans, skirts or wearing under jacket, cardigan and coat.Style this coast top with your fave basic shorts and some slides to complete beach outfit.Style this coast top with denim shorts and strappy sandals to complete this outfit.Suitable for all shapes and choose your comfortable way to wear,Get this fashion casual loose shirt for your wardrobe instantly! Only the most basic clothes can have more space to match different clothes and give others the most surprised feeling Premium Cool Fabric: Skin-Friendly fabric,Soft and Breathable Fabric with Stretchy which make you feel comfortable to wear all day!

Q&A： Q: What this casual button shirt made out of, is it cotton? A:Material: 70%Linen+30%cotton. It is Linen, This trendy shirt super soft and comfortable, you could wear it in all day, it will not clingy on your body. And it is super breathable! Q: Is this business casual shirts true to size? A: It is true to size. I suggest you refer to the size chart before buying, It will fit perfectly and comfy. Q:Do all the buttons work? A:Yes, This fashion shirts functional button up front,Easy to put on and take off. Q:Does it has a bad smell or itch you? A: No bad smell to be found,and we made of soft and high quality material,it won't itch you,don’t worry. Q:How to clean it? A:Recommended Hand Wash, hang to dry in shade.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars True to size!
reviews.reviewText: Some ppl said this top was a little snug so I order next size up!!! Should have stayed with my normal size which is a medium!! The large is too big but I'm just going to tie the front and it should be ok! Love the light yellow color! And the material is nice!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful color, beware of sizing!
reviews.reviewText: The light pink color is absolutely beautiful, not a washed out or dusty pink like most clothes. The little buttons are also a light tan tortoise color, which goes great with the color it’s very feminine! I was hoping for an oversized look though, I would say this fits true to size. If you want it a little looser try getting one size up!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very flattering and comfy!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this shirt a WHILE AGO. Like months ago. I have worn and washed this shirt so many times, and the quality is still there!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not for my body type
reviews.reviewText: I dont like the way it fit me. This looked a lot different on the model.I sized up and while it fit me (loosely) on the circumference, everything else was too big. It's also long so to avoid it looking like a lab coat I would have to tuck it in but it was too bulky to do so.The color was nice and the material felt good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Made with heavier material
reviews.reviewText: I was really super shocked when I received the shirt it’s true to size I absolutely love the material it’s a little bit heavier. It’s not cheesy looking at all. It’s sewed together well and looks on the expensive side. J live it so much I bought a white one. My goal is to buy one in all colors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Fabric doesn’t feel like cotton/linen & shirt has no fabric content tag
reviews.reviewText: For context, I have sewn clothing for 30 years and am pretty good at differentiating natural & man-made fabrics. I’m from the southern US and have worn a LOT of linen and cotton.This doesn’t feel like a cotton and linen blend, which the Amazon page says (se attached). It also doesn’t wrinkle like you’d expect real cotton/linen blends to do (squeeze linen in your fist. It will wrinkle and not spring back. This item wrinkled a little, then smoothed itself out.)And unfortunately, the shirt doesn’t have a label inside telling you the fabric makeup. That is a violation of the US’s Textile Fiber Products Identification Act.The shirt is cute but I’m not keeping it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Run, don't walk, away
reviews.reviewText: I had so much hope for this shirt, but everything fell short. Literally. As the picture shows, the V in the front goes way farther down than indicated in the item images. The point of the V went to the bottom of the sternum - can't wear a bra with it. Also the sides veered way farther up, and that never showed in the images. The sides opened up to the bottom rib bone - can't even tucked the shirt in. The only thing I liked about the shirt was the material - very soft and breezy. Alas, this was a return item.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: After buying one, I had to buy two more. I love the fabric.

Arrived quickly. Beige colour is pleasing. Tag on garment says it's made in China but there is no label anywhere on the item to verify that it is actually linen and/or any other fabric. Just because an add says it's a linen cotton mixture doesn't actually mean it is. Too heavy a garment for 70% linen. Packaging was just a small clear plastic bag with the shirt scrunched inside so it came out covered in wrinkles which naturally happens with linen so I am assuming that there is actually linen in it. Not overly impressed. Watch the measurement chart. The front dips quite low for first button so bra shows slightly. Very long in front and back. I like loose fitting clothes so I don't mind too much. I usually buy clothes in stores so I can touch and try on. This has made me want to return to store purchasing of clothes rather than internet purchases. I personally think it is overpriced.
I did not like the way this one fit or the way it hung on my body. It just had an awkward shape to it. Also the fabric didn’t feel or look like a quality linen.
